article.title: Wikipedia%3ABuilding_Wikipedia_membership%2FNewsgroups
article.paragraph: Newsgroups are a form of mass mailing list.
Although there are many providers of access to newsgroups, one of the major and more well known sites isGoogle Groups
Google Groupsis really easy to use, I've discovered--if you don't have a newsreader set up, it's a more than adequate substitute.
